rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification for CenterPoint Task 21637 for Request 21290.
When moving a file from one data pool to another, and the file being moved is an IR-keyed file, the IR keys become invalid. This application was modified to correct this situation.
See the document named CtrPntTsk21637Rqs21290.doc attached to CenterPoint Task 21637 for Request 21290 for details of what was done.
Modification for CenterPoint Task 19785 for Request 16563.

When moving a file from one data pool to another, any customer-keyed information entered in the corresponding data policy (datadict) record is wiped out. This application was modified to correct this situation.
See the document named CtrPntTsk19785Rqs16563.doc attached to CenterPoint Task 19785 for Request 16563 for details of what was done.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
